attributes.action: BRING FIBRE BROADBAND TO RESIDENTS OF KINGS REACH KINGS LYNN NORFOLK
attributes.additional_details: Kings lynn norfolk has been enabled with fibre broadband (some area's) and the other area's are not even in the footprint for upgrade kings reach being one of these affected area's the housing estate is a new build and situated next to fairstaid estate a stones throw away fairstaid are one of the area's that have been fibre broadband enabled. i don t understand why we have to suffer with the slow broadband speeds and that we are not even considered for upgrade. im sure there are plenty of people who will back me up on this petition and would like the goverment to fund the kings lynn council to get this sorted...
